food1.content1: Our signature dish, featuring chicken that's marinated in a blend of spices, coated in a crispy batter, and deep-fried to golden perfection.
food1.content2: High in protein and a good source of essential vitamins like B6 and B12. However, it's also high in sodium and saturated fat due to the frying process. Potential allergens include gluten (from the batter) and soy (from the oil used for frying).

food2.content1: A spicy twist on our classic crispy chicken, seasoned with a fiery blend of spices for those who like it hot.
food2.content2: In addition to the nutritional benefits of our Classic Crispy Chicken, this dish contains capsaicin from the chili peppers, which can boost metabolism. Potential allergens include gluten and soy, as well as capsicum (from the chili peppers).

food3.content1: Crispy fried chicken tossed in a rich garlic parmesan sauce, offering a deliciously different way to enjoy our chicken.
food3.content2: Provides a good amount of calcium from the Parmesan cheese and has the added health benefits of garlic, which include potential anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects. Potential allergens include gluten, soy, dairy (from the cheese), and alliums (from the garlic).

food4.content1: Sweet and savory meet in this dish, featuring our crispy chicken glazed with a light honey sauce.
food4.content2: A sweet and savory dish that provides a good source of protein. The honey glaze adds a bit of sugar, so it's slightly higher in calories compared to our other dishes. Potential allergens include gluten, soy, and bee pollen (from the honey).
